front.title: There's Gold in them thar Networks! or Searching for Treasure in all the Wrong Places
front.abstract: The ultimate goal is to make the route to these sources of information invisible to you. At present, this is not easy to do. I will explain some of the techniques that can be used to make these nuggets easier to pick up so that we all can be richer. This RFC provides information for the Internet community. It does not specify an Internet standard.
